name: Åetherquest
description:
Welcome to the Åethernet- the most advanced virtual reality world ever created. So advanced, it supersedes virtual reality entirely and is known simply as "Future Reality". Within the Åether exists a utopian city meant to house humanity as reality becomes increasingly unbearable. It is now possible to live entirely in Future Reality, and forget "Reality" ever even existed. In fact, everyone else on Earth has already plugged themselves into the Åether. You are the last holdout, but there is nothing left for you to do in reality all alone. It's time you plug in as well, and discover what the Åether is all about.

As you play and live in the Åether, you will discover 

The true purpose on the Åethernet. 

You will find the city in crisis, besieged by monsters. 

You will find hidden treasures and secrets, interesting characters, and a unique and engaging storyline,

This is only a demo version and is incomplete. It includes about 1-3 hours of gameplay depending on your attention span and how much you want to explore. 

Besides the main story there are several side quests to complete and many more planned. 

I'm very excited to share this game with you and I hope you enjoy it ^_^

^_^_^_^_^_^_^
